text:
RELIGION

Selva Vinayagar Temple: Kalabhairavar puja, Railway Colony, 5 p.m.

Sri Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple: Theppa thiruvizha, fifth-day event, deity procession 9 a.m. and 7 p.m.

Solaimalai Murugan Temple: Thaipusa thiruvizha, third-day event, deity procession, Solaimalai Mandapam, Alagarkoil 10.30 a.m. and 6.30 p.m.

Ramakrishna Math: Discourse on “Bhagwan Sri Ramakrishnanarin Vaalvum Vaakkum” by Swami Guruvaranandar, 5.45 p.m., aarathi, Reserve Line, New Natham Road, 6.30 p.m.

Thiruvalluvar Kazhagam: 74{+t}{+h}year celebrations, Kandasamy Pulavar Memorial celebrations, Prof. M. Thirumalai, Vice-Chancellor, Tamil University, Thanjavur, speaks on ‘Indraya Vaazhvil Valluvam,’ North Adi Street, 6.30 p.m.

Paneeru Thirumurai Mandram: Pannisai by S.S. Mohanram, Adi Streets, 7 a.m., Discourse on ‘Peria Puranam’ by N.S. Sundararaman, Sundar Nagar, Tirunagar, 5 p.m.

Sri Swami Tatwananda Ashram: Upanishad class by Swami Samanandar, P and T Nagar, 6.45 p.m.

Gita Bhavanam: 68{+t}{+h}anniversary, 45-day yagna, Kamarajar Salai, 7.30 a.m.

Young Men’s Brahmins’ Association: Sri Vishnu Sahasranama parayanam and puja, No. 21 Sambandamoorthy Street, 6 p.m.

The American College: Sunday communion service, Dr. Milton Jeganathan preaches, Dr. S. Joseph Wellington leads, Jubilee chapel, 6 p.m.

CULTURE

Gandhi Memorial Museum: Yoga classes, 6 a.m., 10.30 a.m. and 5 p.m.

International Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Centre: Yoga and meditation classes, 444 KK Nagar East Ninth Street, 6 a.m., 6.30 p.m., 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. (for women).

Prajapita Brahma Kumaris Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya: Free rajayoga meditation classes, 36 Meenakshi Nagar, P and T Nagar, 40 Sambandamoorthy Street, 47 B CMR Road and 357 Anna Nagar, 6.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m.

Yoga Research Centre: Yoga training, Madura College, 6.30 a.m.

Arsha Parampara: Mundakopanishad 7 a.m. and Bhaja Govindam, Yagasalai Andalpuram, 6.30 p.m., Lalitha Sahasranamam and spiritual heritage classes by Swamini Vidyananda Saraswathi, Old Kalyana Mandapam, Meenakshi Temple, 10 a.m.

Sri Aurobindo Study Forum: Sath sang on Sri Aurobindo’s ‘Life divine’ by Prof. Subramony, Nithyatha, Aurolab, Veerapanchan, 10 a.m.

GENERAL

Corporation of Madurai: Inauguration of pulse polio programme, Commissioner C. Kathiravan chief guest, Palanganatham bus stand, 7 a.m.

Government Museum: Expo of currencies/coins/stamps of 200 countries on display, 10.30 a.m.

J. Vasanthan Art Foundation: Second annual memorial celebration, Dr. Anuradha Kapur, former director National School of Drama, New Delhi, to be awarded J. Vasanthan lifetime achievement award by G. Srinivasan, president, Govel Trust, Aravind Eye Hospital, Old Natham Road, 5 p.m.

Madurai Philatelists and Numismatists Association: A. Chellavel speaks on ‘Tamil Nadu Hand Mint Coin,’ Victoria Edward Hall, 10 a.m.

Padikkattugal: Fourth-year celebrations, Tamil Nadu Polytechnic campus, TPK Road, 9 a.m.

Vidiyal: Ripple circle, Abdul Rahman facilitates, 9 a.m., Tamil forum, Rathinapuram, 2 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting, Krishna Iyer Hall, 7 p.m., Alfred Noble Matric HSS, Tirunagar, 11 a.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting, R.C. School, Sivaganga Road, Melur, 6.30 p.m.
title: madurai today
